notes: The LLM incorrectly classified the contract as safe. The contract contains a clear DoS vulnerability in the emptyCreditors() function. The function has an unbounded loop that iterates creditorAddresses.length times, which can be made arbitrarily large through repeated calls to addCreditors(). When creditorAddresses.length > 1500, the loop in emptyCreditors() will consume excessive gas and revert, preventing the win state from being set. This is a classic gas-based DoS attack vector.
